They offer Bang \u0026amp; Olufsen Signature Sound, up to 5 hours of playtime, and on-the-go charging.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cdiv data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"shortTechReview\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv tabindex=\"0\" data-sln-id=\"automation_markdownContent_container\" class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 gHkjYW a-markdownContent focus-styling no-title\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"row\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 cslVrS a-topFeature col-xs-12\" data-sln-id=\"atm_PDP_topFeature_item\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"a-topFeature__feature\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv tabindex=\"0\" class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 gHkjYW a-markdownContent focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-sln-id=\"automation_markdownContent_container\" data-focus-visible-added=\"\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cp data-sln-id=\"undefined_description\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003eThanks to a combination of finely tuned acoustics, design and ergonomics, Beoplay E6 provides rich sound with a very strong bass performance. You can easily tailor the audio to your own taste and preferences with the Beoplay app on your smartphone.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 cslVrS a-topFeature col-xs-12 col-md-6\" data-sln-id=\"atm_PDP_secFeature_ul0_item\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"a-topFeature__feature\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv tabindex=\"0\" class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 gHkjYW a-markdownContent focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-sln-id=\"automation_markdownContent_container\" data-focus-visible-added=\"\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cp data-sln-id=\"undefined_description\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003eBecause all ears are different, Beoplay E6 comes with a selection of ear fins, guaranteed to provide you with a secure and comfortable fit that's perfect for active everyday use. \u003cmeta charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\u003cspan data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003eThe durable earphone housing is made from textured rubber and polymer, designed to resist sweat and moisture, and the in-line remote comes with aluminum button controls. As these earphones are i\u003c\/span\u003enspired by urban sneaker culture, the cord connecting the earbuds is encased in braided textile.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 cslVrS a-topFeature col-xs-12 col-md-6\" data-sln-id=\"atm_PDP_secFeature_ul1_item\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"a-topFeature__feature\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv tabindex=\"0\" class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 gHkjYW a-markdownContent focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-sln-id=\"automation_markdownContent_container\" data-focus-visible-added=\"\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 cslVrS a-topFeature col-xs-12 col-md-6\" data-sln-id=\"atm_PDP_secFeature_ul2_item\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"a-topFeature__feature\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv tabindex=\"0\" class=\"sc-182o2pm-0 gHkjYW a-markdownContent focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-sln-id=\"automation_markdownContent_container\" data-focus-visible-added=\"\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cp data-sln-id=\"undefined_description\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003eBeoplay E6 comes with a clever charging feature that lets you charge your earphones while you use them. For easy wear and quick access, each earpiece is also fitted with a small magnet, which lets you wear the earphones around your neck without risking losing them. An enhanced skin-detect sensor accurately turns AirPods on or off, preserving the battery when necessary. With just 5 minutes of charge, you’ll get around an hour of listening or talk time. And the MagSafe Charging Case delivers more than 30 hours of battery life and is compatible with MagSafe and wireless chargers.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eSweat and water resistant\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eBoth AirPods and the MagSafe Charging Case are rated IPX4 water resistant — so they’ll withstand anything from rain to heavy workouts.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eMagical in every way\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSetup is effortless — pull them out of the case and they’re ready to use. Take\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods are lightweight and offer a contoured design. They sit at just the right angle for comfort and to better direct audio to your ear. The stem is 33 percent shorter than AirPods (2nd generation) and includes a force sensor to easily control music and calls.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eSpatial audio with dynamic head tracking\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSound is placed all around you to create an immersive, three-dimensional listening experience for music, TV shows, and movies. Gyroscopes and accelerometers in AirPods work together to track your head movements — so it sounds like you’re in the center of songs and scenes.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eAdaptive EQ\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eMusic is automatically tuned to suit the shape of your ear. Inward-facing microphones detect what you’re hearing, then adjust low- and mid-range frequencies to deliver the rich details in every song.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eLonger battery life\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods have an extra hour of battery life compared with AirPods (2nd generation) for up to 6 hours of listening time and up to 4 hours of talk time. An enhanced skin-detect sensor accurately turns AirPods on or off, preserving the battery when necessary. With just 5 minutes of charge, you’ll get around an hour of listening or talk time. And the MagSafe Charging Case delivers more than 30 hours of battery life and is compatible with MagSafe and wireless chargers.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eSweat and water resistant\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eBoth AirPods and the MagSafe Charging Case are rated IPX4 water resistant — so they’ll withstand anything from rain to heavy workouts.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eMagical in every way\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eSetup is effortless — pull them out of the case and they’re ready to use. Automatically switch between your Apple devices. In-ear detection knows the difference between your ear and other surfaces. Announce Notifications with Siri gives you the option to have Siri read your notifications through your AirPods. And with Audio Sharing, you and a friend can easily share a song or show between any two sets of AirPods.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eWhat’s in the Box\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods, MagSafe Charging Case, Lightning to USB-C Cable, Documentation\u003c\/p\u003e"},{"id":6682440663115,"title":"AirPods Pro with MagSafe Charging Case","handle":"apple-airpods-pro-magsafe-charging-case","description":"\u003cmeta charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eOur Take\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods Pro are the perfect companion to basically any and every Apple device. From your iPhone to your iPad, \u003cspan\u003eAirPods Pro\u003c\/span\u003e will pair quickly and easily and allow you to listen to your favorite albums, podcasts, and audiobooks. With Apple Watch, however, AirPods become an almost essential complement to your everyday kit. Whether working out or walking to the office, pairing Apple Watch Series 5 with AirPods Pro will let you enjoy your day without needing your iPhone, with the benefit of Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound and Transparency Mode for when you need to hear everything around you.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods Pro even allow you to choose from three different three sizes of soft, flexible silicone tips that click into place for all-day comfort. When setting up AirPods Pro for the first time, the Ear Tip Fit Test will help you determine what size is best for you. These internally tapered tips conform to your ear shape, keeping AirPods Pro secure, and with vents helping equalize pressure, it almost feels like there's nothing in your ears. But if you want to hear what's happening around you, just press and hold the force sensor on the stem to jump between Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency Mode.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cmeta charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe MagSafe Charging Case delivers more than 24 hours of battery life. When it’s time to charge, just set the case down on your MagSafe charger, or a wireless charging mat, and let it charge. And when you’re away from a wireless charger, you can use the Lightning port to With Apple Watch, however, AirPods become an almost essential complement to your everyday kit. These internally tapered tips conform to your ear shape, keeping AirPods Pro secure, and with vents helping equalize pressure, it almost feels like there's nothing in your ears. With Wireless Charging Case","handle":"airpods-with-wireless-charging-case","description":"\u003cmeta charset=\"utf-8\"\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eOur Take\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eAirPods are the perfect companion to basically any and every Apple device. From your iPhone to your iPad, \u003cspan\u003eAirPods Pro\u003c\/span\u003e will pair quickly and easily and allow you to listen to your favorite albums, podcasts, and audiobooks. With Apple Watch, however, AirPods become an almost essential complement to your everyday kit. Whether working out or walking to the office, pairing Apple Watch Series 5 with AirPods delivers an unparalleled wireless headphone experience. After a simple one-tap setup, AirPods are automatically on and always connected. Using them is just as easy. They sense when they're in your ears and pause when you take them out.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOptical sensors and motion accelerometers work together to automatically control the audio experience, engaging the microphones for phone calls and Siri access, and enabling AirPods to play sound as soon as they're in your ears. You also have the freedom to wear one or both AirPods, and you can play or skip forward with a double-tap when listening to music. A speech-detecting accelerometer recognizes when you're speaking and works with a pair of microphones to filter out external noise and focus on the sound of your voice.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWith the included Wireless Charging Case, charging is as simple as placing an AirPods case on a Qi-certified charging mat. The LED indicator on the front of the case lets you know that your AirPods are charging. And when you're away from a charging mat, you can use the Lightning port to charge.\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eSpecifications\u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cb\u003eWeight\u003c\/b\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eAirPods The gorgeous wool-blend speaker covers for Beoplay A9 are made in collaboration with renowned textile brand, Kvadrat. The Danish design company has produced a series of covers in a wide variety of colors that will make your speaker pop or blend in with your home décor. The result is an iconic piece of music design you can put on display anywhere.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eDesigned to change with your own lifestyle. focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThis powerful soundbar brings Bang \u0026amp; Olufsen sound to your own TV without the need of a subwoofer.\u003cbr\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eBeosound Stage enhances your viewing pleasure with a combination of the latest in audio technology and seamless design. The Beosound Stage works with any TV supporting HDMI ARC, and with four woofers in the eleven-driver setup, no additional subwoofer is needed.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eBeosound Stage offers a 3 channel sound system with a superior center channel for optimized speech reproduction. The viewing experience is enhanced even further with Dolby Atmos, a function where sound moves around you in a three dimensional space. Beosound Stage includes eleven speaker drivers each driven by its own amplifier, and the result is a three-channel, fully active, DSP based loudspeaker solution delivering a superbly deep and rich performance.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe basic TV sound setup of Beosound Stage only requires you to connect the included HDMI cable between Beosound Stage and the HDMI ARC connection of your TV. Then, select correct speaker\/sound output in your TV menu. Through the Bang \u0026amp; Olufsen App, once you register the product, you can choose among different \"listening modes\" according to what you are listening or watching on tv. Hear every voice, action, or music clearly.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eExclusive and functional materials combine Scandinavian simplicity with state of the art audio technology to create the Beosound Stage. An endless frame of long line standing aluminum surrounds the textile of the speaker front. The control buttons integrate seamlessly, a visual continuation of the infinite frame. A deliberate gap between the frame and the fabric cover highlights the contrast from the aluminum to the warm fabric. Beosound Stage brings expressive minimalism to any interior – while maximizing the TV experience.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" focus-styling no-title focus-visible\" data-mce-tabindex=\"0\"\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThis powerful soundbar brings Bang \u0026amp; Olufsen sound to your own TV without the need of a subwoofer.\u003cbr\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eBeosound Stage enhances your viewing pleasure with a combination of the latest in audio technology and seamless design. The Beosound Stage works with any TV supporting HDMI ARC, and with four woofers in the eleven-driver setup, no additional subwoofer is needed.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eBeosound Stage offers a 3 channel sound system with a superior center channel for optimized speech reproduction. The viewing experience is enhanced even further with Dolby Atmos, a function where sound moves around you in a three dimensional space. Beosound Stage includes eleven speaker drivers each driven by its own amplifier, and the result is a three-channel, fully active, DSP based loudspeaker solution delivering a superbly deep and rich performance.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe basic TV sound setup of Beosound Stage only requires you to connect the included HDMI cable between Beosound Stage and the HDMI ARC connection of your TV. Then, select correct speaker\/sound output in your TV menu. Through the Bang \u0026amp; Olufsen App, once you register the product, you can choose among different \"listening modes\" according to what you are listening or watching on tv. Hear every voice, action, or music clearly.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eExclusive and functional materials combine Scandinavian simplicity with state of the art audio technology to create the Beosound Stage. An endless frame of long line standing aluminum surrounds the textile of the speaker front. The control buttons integrate seamlessly, a visual continuation of the infinite frame. A deliberate gap between the frame and the fabric cover highlights the contrast from the aluminum to the warm fabric. Beosound Stage brings expressive minimalism to any interior – while maximizing the TV experience.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" Superior sound.\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eOur Take \u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eMontblanc's Augmented Paper takes the company's century-long expertise in the field of writing instruments and applies it to the world of digital note taking. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eEach Augmented Paper set comes with a high-end leather-wrapped notebook and one of the company's famous StarWalker ballpoint pens. But it's not just any notebook, and it's not just any pen. The notebook and pen use electromagnetic resonance to capture whatever is written on the page – from doodles to your watch wishlist – and immediately digitizes it within the notebook's storage center. Your notes can then be transferred via Bluetooth to an app on your smartphone for on-the-go access. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe StarWalker pen and calfskin leather notebook are just as high-end as you'd expect something from Montblanc, but here, they combine to create a uniquely 21st century solution to an age-old practice. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003c\/article\u003e\n\u003c\/div\u003e\n\u003c\/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"row uspContainer\" data-mce-fragment=\"1\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv practice. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003c\/article\u003e\n\u003c\/div\u003e\n\u003c\/div\u003e\n\u003cdiv data-mce-fragment=\"1\" class=\"row uspContainer\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv But it's not just any notebook, and it's not just any pen. The notebook and pen use electromagnetic resonance to capture whatever is written on the page – from doodles to your watch wishlist – and immediately digitizes it within the notebook's storage center. Your notes can then be transferred via Bluetooth to an app on your smartphone for on-the-go access. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe But it's not just any notebook, and it's not just any pen. The notebook and pen use electromagnetic resonance to capture whatever is written on the page – from doodles to your watch wishlist – and immediately digitizes it within the notebook's storage center. Your notes can then be transferred via Bluetooth to an app on your smartphone for on-the-go access. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe Superior sound.\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv data-mce-fragment=\"1\" class=\"row\"\u003e\n\u003cdiv data-mce-fragment=\"1\" class=\"o-productDetail__info col-xs-12 col-sm-6\"\u003e\n\u003carticle data-mce-fragment=\"1\" aria-label=\"Pure expression. Superior sound.\" class=\"o-productDetail__description -fadeInUp\"\u003e\n\u003ch2\u003eOur Take \u003c\/h2\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThe most recent category Montblanc has expanded into is one that will be familiar to anyone that is a frequent flyer or finds themselves working in noisy environs, whether at home or in the office. It's noise-canceling headphones.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eIntroduced in the fall of 2020, Montblanc's inaugural contender in the ever-crowded wireless headphone segment stacks up favorably against the competition, despite its green status. Of course, being from Montblanc, you expect impressive build quality – and the MB 01 Headphones don't disappoint. Crafted out of aluminum and high-end leather, these over-ear headphones offer Bluetooth connectivity and Google Assistant. And when it came to audio performance and quality, Montblanc called in some support from Alex Rosson, an American engineer that founded Audeze, a maker of headphones that's ranked top among audiophiles for years.\u003c\/span\u003e\u003c\/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"font-weight: 400;\" data-mce-style=\"font-weight: 400;\"\u003eThere are a number of headphone enthusiasts that call the HODINKEE office home, so when a few pairs of MB 01 headphones arrived for an introductory test drive, we had just the team to run them through the paces. The result? Above average delivery in every facet, from noise canceling to pure audio quality. Dupont to produce a limited edition lighter in Palladium, lacquered in our signature shade of HODINKEE\u003cspan class=\"Apple-converted-space\"\u003e \u003c\/span\u003egrey. Dupont lighter, but the HODINKEE limited edition version carries over more than precise mechanical engagement; it draws inspiration from the quintessential lighters S.T. Dupont was making in the 1940s-1960s. The iconic lines, a carefully machined flint wheel, and a gorgeous lacquer finish are all hallmarks of classic S.T. Dupont styling that have made their way into this edition. \u003c\/span\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cspan class=\"s1\"\u003e\u003c\/span\u003e\u003cbr\u003e\u003cspan class=\"s1\"\u003eThe Ligne 2 for HODINKEE comes in specially made packaging inspired by archival examples of Dupont packaging from the mid-1900s. <script class="analytics">(function () {
  var customDocumentWrite = function(content) {
    var jquery = null;

    if (window.jQuery) {
      jquery = window.jQuery;
    } else if (window.Checkout && window.Checkout.$) {
      jquery = window.Checkout.$;
    }

    if (jquery) {
      jquery('body').append(content);
    }
  };

  var hasLoggedConversion = function(token) {
    if (token) {
      return document.cookie.indexOf('loggedConversion=' + token) !== -1;
    }
    return false;
  }

  var setCookieIfConversion = function(token) {
    if (token) {
      var twoMonthsFromNow = new Date(Date.now());
      twoMonthsFromNow.setMonth(twoMonthsFromNow.getMonth() + 2);

      document.cookie = 'loggedConversion=' + token + '; expires=' + twoMonthsFromNow;
    }
  }

  var trekkie = window.ShopifyAnalytics.lib = window.trekkie = window.trekkie || [];
  if (trekkie.integrations) {
    return;
  }

    'identify',
    'page',
    'ready',
    'track',
    'trackForm',
    'trackLink'
  ];
  trekkie.factory = function(method) {
    return function() {
      var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
      args.unshift(method);
      trekkie.push(args);
      return trekkie;
    };
  };
  for (var i = 0; i < trekkie.methods.length; i++) {
    var key = trekkie.methods[i];
    trekkie[key] = trekkie.factory(key);
  }

              var Monorail = {
      produce: function produce(monorailDomain, schemaId, payload) {
        var currentMs = new Date().getTime();
        var event = {
          schema_id: schemaId,
          payload: payload,
          metadata: {
            event_created_at_ms: currentMs,
            event_sent_at_ms: currentMs
          }
        };
        return Monorail.sendRequest("https://" + monorailDomain + "/v1/produce", JSON.stringify(event));
      },
      sendRequest: function sendRequest(endpointUrl, payload) {
        // Try the sendBeacon API
        if (window && window.navigator && typeof window.navigator.sendBeacon === 'function' && typeof window.Blob === 'function' && !Monorail.isIos12()) {
          var blobData = new window.Blob([payload], {
            type: 'text/plain'
          });
    
          if (window.navigator.sendBeacon(endpointUrl, blobData)) {
            return true;
          } // sendBeacon was not successful
    
        } // XHR beacon   
    
        var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    
        try {
          xhr.open('POST', endpointUrl);
          xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'text/plain');
          xhr.send(payload);
        } catch (e) {
          console.log(e);
        }
    
        return false;
      },
      isIos12: function isIos12() {
        return window.navigator.userAgent.lastIndexOf('iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 12_') !== -1 || window.navigator.userAgent.lastIndexOf('iPad; CPU OS 12_') !== -1;
      }
    };

(function () {
  if (window.BOOMR && (window.BOOMR.version || window.BOOMR.snippetExecuted)) {
    return;
  }
  window.BOOMR = window.BOOMR || {};
  window.BOOMR.snippetStart = new Date().getTime();
  window.BOOMR.snippetExecuted = true;
  window.BOOMR.snippetVersion = 12;
  window.BOOMR.application = "storefront-renderer";
  window.BOOMR.themeName = "";
  window.BOOMR.themeVersion = "";
  window.BOOMR.shopId = 1460732;
  window.BOOMR.themeId = 121044074571;
  window.BOOMR.url =
    "https://cdn.shopify.com/shopifycloud/boomerang/shopify-boomerang-1.0.0.min.js";
  var where = document.currentScript || document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
  var parentNode = where.parentNode;
  var promoted = false;
  var LOADER_TIMEOUT = 3000;
  function promote() {
    if (promoted) {
      return;
    }
    var script = document.createElement("script");
    script.id = "boomr-scr-as";
    script.src = window.BOOMR.url;
    script.async = true;
    parentNode.appendChild(script);
    promoted = true;
  }
  function iframeLoader(wasFallback) {
    promoted = true;
    var dom, bootstrap, iframe, iframeStyle;
    var doc = document;
    var win = window;
    window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = wasFallback ? "if" : "i";
    bootstrap = function(parent, scriptId) {
      var script = doc.createElement("script");
      script.id = scriptId || "boomr-if-as";
      script.src = window.BOOMR.url;
      BOOMR_lstart = new Date().getTime();
      parent = parent || doc.body;
      parent.appendChild(script);
    };
    if (!window.addEventListener && window.attachEvent && navigator.userAgent.match(/MSIE [67]./)) {
      window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = "s";
      bootstrap(parentNode, "boomr-async");
      return;
    }
    iframe = document.createElement("IFRAME");
    iframe.src = "about:blank";
    iframe.title = "";
    iframe.role = "presentation";
    iframe.loading = "eager";
    iframeStyle = (iframe.frameElement || iframe).style;
    iframeStyle.width = 0;
    iframeStyle.height = 0;
    iframeStyle.border = 0;
    iframeStyle.display = "none";
    parentNode.appendChild(iframe);
    try {
      win = iframe.contentWindow;
      doc = win.document.open();
    } catch (e) {
      dom = document.domain;
      iframe.src = "javascript:var d=document.open();d.domain='" + dom + "';void(0);";
      win = iframe.contentWindow;
      doc = win.document.open();
    }
    if (dom) {
      doc._boomrl = function() {
        this.domain = dom;
        bootstrap();
      };
      doc.write("<body onload='document._boomrl();'>");
    } else {
      win._boomrl = function() {
        bootstrap();
      };
      if (win.addEventListener) {
        win.addEventListener("load", win._boomrl, false);
      } else if (win.attachEvent) {
        win.attachEvent("onload", win._boomrl);
      }
    }
    doc.close();
  }
  var link = document.createElement("link");
  if (link.relList &&
    typeof link.relList.supports === "function" &&
    link.relList.supports("preload") &&
    ("as" in link)) {
    window.BOOMR.snippetMethod = "p";
    link.href = window.BOOMR.url;
    link.rel = "preload";
    link.as = "script";
    link.addEventListener("load", promote);
    link.addEventListener("error", function() {
      iframeLoader(true);
    });
    setTimeout(function() {
      if (!promoted) {
        iframeLoader(true);
      }
    }, LOADER_TIMEOUT);
    BOOMR_lstart = new Date().getTime();
    parentNode.appendChild(link);
  } else {
    iframeLoader(false);
  }
  function boomerangSaveLoadTime(e) {
    window.BOOMR_onload = (e && e.timeStamp) || new Date().getTime();
  }
  if (window.addEventListener) {
    window.addEventListener("load", boomerangSaveLoadTime, false);
  } else if (window.attachEvent) {
    window.attachEvent("onload", boomerangSaveLoadTime);
  }
  if (document.addEventListener) {
    document.addEventListener("onBoomerangLoaded", function(e) {
      e.detail.BOOMR.init({
        producer_url: "https://monorail-edge.shopifysvc.com/v1/produce",
        ResourceTiming: {
          enabled: true,
          trackedResourceTypes: ["script", "img", "css"]
        },
      });
      e.detail.BOOMR.t_end = new Date().getTime();
    });
  } else if (document.attachEvent) {
    document.attachEvent("onpropertychange", function(e) {
      if (!e) e=event;
      if (e.propertyName === "onBoomerangLoaded") {
        e.detail.BOOMR.init({
          producer_url: "https://monorail-edge.shopifysvc.com/v1/produce",

            enabled: true,

          },
        });

      }
    });
  }

  <script src="//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0146/0732/t/360/assets/application.js?v=161124906533998910861655473871" type="text/javascript"></script>

  

  <script>
    (function(){
      
      var now = new Date();
      var year = now.getFullYear();
      var copyrightYearElems = document.querySelectorAll('.copyright .year');
      for (var i = copyrightYearElems.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        copyrightYearElems[i].innerHTML = now.getFullYear();
      }

      imgix.onready(function() {
        imgix.fluid({
          updateOnResizeDown: true,
          pixelStep: 5,
          autoInsertCSSBestPractices: false
        });
      });

    })();

    
  </script>

  
  
    <!-- /snippets/ajax-cart-template.liquid -->

  <script id="CartTemplate" type="text/template">
  
    <div class="ajax-cart__inner" aria-live="polite">
      <p class="ajax-cart__title">Recently Added</p>
      <form action="/cart" method="post" novalidate class="cart ajaxcart">
        <div class="ajaxcart__inner">
          {{#items}}
          <div class="ajaxcart__product">
            <div class="ajaxcart__row" data-line="{{line}}">
              <div class="hs-grid">
                <div class="hs-grid__item one-quarter">
                  <a href="{{url}}" class="ajaxcart__product-image"><img src="{{img}}" alt=""></a>
                </div>
                <div class="hs-grid__item one-half text-left">
                  <p>
                    <a href="{{url}}" class="ajaxcart__product-name">{{name}}</a>
                    {{#if variation}}
                      <span class="ajaxcart__product-meta"> - {{variation}}</span>
                    {{/if}}
                    {{#properties}}
                      {{#each this}}
                        {{#if this}}
                          <span class="ajaxcart__product-meta">{{@key}}: {{this}}</span>
                        {{/if}}
                      {{/each}}
                    {{/properties}}
                    
                  </p>
                </div>
                <div class="hs-grid__item one-quarter text-right">{{{price}}}</div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          {{/items}}

          
        </div>
        <div class="ajaxcart__footer">
          <div class="hs-grid">
            <div class="hs-grid__item one-half text-left">
              <a href="/cart">{{{item_count}}} items</a>
            </div>
            <div class="hs-grid__item one-quarter">
              <p>Subtotal</p>
            </div>
            <div class="hs-grid__item one-quarter text-right">
              <p>{{{totalPrice}}}</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </form>
    
    </script>

    <script src="//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0146/0732/t/360/assets/ajax-cart.js?v=184090969691312286841655473961" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script>
      jQuery(function($) {
        ajaxCart.init({
          formSelector: 'form[action^="/cart/add"]',
          cartContainer: '#CartContainer',
          addToCartSelector: '.AddToCart',
          cartCountSelector: '.CartCount',
          cartCostSelector: '#CartCost',
          moneyFormat: "${{amount_no_decimals}}"
        });

        ajaxCart.loadCartCount();
      });

      jQuery('body').on('ajaxCart.afterCartLoad', function(evt, cart) {
        // Bind to 'ajaxCart.afterCartLoad' to run any javascript after the cart has loaded in the DOM
        $('#CartContainer').addClass('visible');
        $('html,body').animate({
          scrollTop: 0
        }, 300);
        setTimeout(function(){
          $('#CartContainer').removeClass('visible');
        }, 5000);
      });
    </script>
    <script src="//cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0146/0732/t/360/assets/timber.js?v=46932245562358906811655473961" type="text/javascript"></script>
  

  

  <script>
$(function () {
  $(document).on('keyup', '.email-signup-form [name="EMAIL"]', function (e) {
    if (e.keyCode !== 13 && $(this).hasClass('error-state')) {
      $(this).removeClass('error-state');
      $(this).parent().find('.error-msg').hide();
    }
  });

  $(document).on('submit', '.email-signup-form', function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    e.stopImmediatePropagation();

    gtag('event', 'conversion', { 'send_to': 'AW-814729994/ETS3CNbY934Qipa_hAM' });

    var $form = $(this);
    var $emailInput = $form.find('[name="EMAIL"]');
    var $container = $form.closest('.mc-form-container');

    if ($emailInput.val() === '') {
      $emailInput.focus();
      return false;
    }

    $.ajax({
      type: $form.attr('method'),
      url: $form.attr('action'),
      data: $form.serialize(),
      cache: false,
      dataType: 'jsonp',
      jsonp: 'c',
      contentType: 'application/json; charset=utf-8',
      error: function(err) {},
      success: function(data) {
        if (data.result != 'success') {
          $emailInput.addClass('error-state');
          if (data.msg.match('is already subscribed')) {
            $form.find('.error-msg').text($emailInput.val() + ' is already subscribed.').show();
          } else if(data.msg.charAt(0) == '0') {
            $form.find('.error-msg').text('Please enter a valid e-mail address.').show();
          } else {
            $form.find('.error-msg').text('There was an error trying to subscribe. Please try again.').show();
          }
        } else {
          $emailInput.removeClass('error-state');
          $form.hide();
          $container.find('.success-msg').find('.email-holder').text($emailInput.val());
          $container.find('.success-msg').show();
        }
      }
    });
  });
});
</script>

  $(function() {
    // First we need to identify if the user is logged in or has logged in before...
    // Provided user is not incognito or using a fresh browser/cleared cookies,
    // On prod, can use the 'tracker_device' cookie to determine this.

  <script>
$(function () {
  $(document).delegate('[data-track-click]', 'click', function (e) {
    if (typeof window.ga === 'undefined' || typeof e.currentTarget.href === 'undefined') return true

    const href = e.currentTarget.href
    const target = e.currentTarget.target
    const label = $(this).data('label') || href
    const category = $(this).data('category') || 'NONE'

    function doRedirect() {
      if (target !== '_blank') {
        document.location = href
      }
    }

    try {
      window.dataLayer.push({
        event: 'clickTracking',
        eventCategory: category,
        eventLabel: label,
        hitCallback: doRedirect
      });

      setTimeout(doRedirect, 500)

      return target === '_blank' ? true : false
    } catch (ex) {
      return true
    }
  })
})
</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
  (function () {
    var analytics = window.analytics = window.analytics || [];
    if (analytics.initialize) return;
    if (analytics.invoked) {
      if (window.console && console.error) {
        console.error('Segment snippet included twice.');
      }
      return;
    }
    analytics.invoked = true;
    analytics.methods = ['identify', 'page', 'track'];
    analytics.factory = function (method) {
      return function () {
        var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
        args.unshift(method);
        analytics.push(args);
        return analytics;
      };
    };
    for (var i = 0; i < analytics.methods.length; i++) {
      var key = analytics.methods[i];
      analytics[key] = analytics.factory(key);
    }
    analytics.load = function (key, options) {
      var script = document.createElement('script');
      script.type = 'text/javascript';
      script.async = true;
      script.src = 'https://cdn.segment.com/analytics.js/v1/'
        + key + '/analytics.min.js';
      var first = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
      first.parentNode.insertBefore(script, first);
      analytics._loadOptions = options;
    };
    analytics.SNIPPET_VERSION = '4.13.2';
    
      
      analytics._writeKey = 'ByXpAWJ9CrisXZxDZZUaEGabovMltds3'
      analytics.load('ByXpAWJ9CrisXZxDZZUaEGabovMltds3');
      
    
  })();
</script>
